p: The diameter of the drops produced, using the current equipment, ranged from 100 to 400 μm which is closer to droplet sizes of agricultural sprays [ 16], but higher compared to standard ULV applicators. Commercial devices may generate droplets which can vary from 38 μm to 65 μm [ 59]. Nevertheless, standard spreader supplied with mist sprayers have diameter average which is about 100 μm, or even more, according to the nozzle and pressure used.
